'''Vanarana''' refers to a set of locations released in [[Version 3.0]]:
* [[Vanarana (Subarea)]], the [[subarea]] consisting of the Aranara village also known as '''Mahavanaranapna'''.
* [[Old Vanarana|Old Vanarana (Subarea)]], the old home of the [[Aranara]] before the cataclysm.
* [[Vanarana (Area)]], the greater [[area]] encompassing the village and its close surroundings.
